title: WTB: bat off Cobb with missing top left corner
author: notfast

posts.post_title: WTB: bat off Cobb with missing top left corner
posts.post_content:
So I’ve somehow acquired a green PSA 1.5, red PSA 1, bat on PSA 1 and each one is missing a top left corner. These cards all have great eye appeal so I’d love to find a bat off Cobb that “matches”

Very specific request I know. But figure it’s worth a shot. :D

[quote name="notfast" post=2135505]So I’ve somehow acquired a green PSA 1.5, red PSA 1, bat on PSA 1 and each one is missing a top left corner. These cards all have great eye appeal so I’d love to find a bat off Cobb that “matches”



Very specific request I know. But figure it’s worth a shot. :D[/QUOTE]Alternatively,  get a full one, and lop the corner off to match the  rest of yours.   At least it'll broaden your search parameters..

Sent from my SM-G950U using Tapatalk
